short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Taking notes has never been this simple before!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A very simple note taking extension that does not disrupt what you are doing. Rhinote lays over what ever site you are browsing so you can easily write a note and go back to browsing. Features auto saves so you never lose your notes. Choose the color you want you note to be to stay organize.
